esp:image.description: LAK 25, from A. Deimel, Liste der Archaische Keilschriftzeichen.

body.p:
Provides a global registry of sign names, variants and readings for use by Oracc.
Managed by Niek Veldhuis at UC Berkeley.
You can browse or search the signlist here.
You can learn how to report a Report a new sign or value here.
